ingredients: 1 can whole tomatoes (Italian seasoning is fine)
3 t dried oregano, basil, and rosemary (about 1 t each)
1 package lasagna noodles (you will probably have more than you need in the package)
16 oz mozzarella cheese (I like to use mozzarella cheese; you can get it and shred it. I don’t mess with that. Just buy it shredded if you can.)
